definitions.definition: A binary compound of bromine and some other element or radical.
A dose of bromide taken as a sedative, or to reduce sexual appetite.
(by extension) A dull person with conventional thoughts.
definitions.example: My adviser at college was a bromide who had not had an original thought in years.
We hoped the speech would include reassurances, but instead it was merely one bromide after another.

definitions.definition: A print made on bromide paper.
